content.rendered:
Pascan Aviation, is a regional airline based in Longueuil, Quebec, Canada. Based at Montreal Saint-Hubert Longueuil Airport in the Saint-Hubert borough of Longueuil, Pascan operates scheduled flights within Quebec and Labrador as well as charter services.Its main base is Montreal Saint-Hubert Longueuil Airport and it runs a fixed-base operator at the airport.

The airline was established in 1999 by Serge Charron. Pascan connects 11 regions throughout Quebec and Newfoundland and Labrador.

Pascan Aviation Address, Phone, Email, Working hours

Address: 6200, airport road
Saint-Hubert, Quebec
J3Y 8Y9

Phone: 1 888 313-8777, 1 450 443-0500

Fax: 1 450 443-4746

Email: info@pascan.com

Reservation Center (Ticket purchase, modification, or cancellation)

Phone: 1-888-885-8777

Email: reservations@pascan.com

Opening hours: Mon to Fri: 7 a.m. to 7 p.m.
Sat-Sun: 8:30 a.m. to 5 p.m.

Passenger service (Comments, baggage claim, compensation)
Email: servicepassager@pascan.com

Charter (aircraft charter)
Email: nolisement@pascan.com

FBO (Private plane, fuel prices, hangar request)
Email: fbo@pascan.com

Business development and group or corporate rate
Email: ventes@pascan.com

Sponsorship (Request for donations / Sponsorships)
Email: commandites@pascan.com

Pascan Aviation Official website: https://www.pascan.com/en/

Pascan Aviation Online Check-in: https://www.pascan.com/en/flights-info-pascan/

Note: Check-in counters will open 90 minutes before departure and counters will close 45 minutes prior to scheduled time of departure.

Pascan Aviation Baggage Allowance

View Pascan Aviation Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Pascan Aviation 

  • British Aerospace Jetstream
  • Pilatus PC-12
  • Saab 340

Queries handled by Pascan Aviation Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Pascan Aviation Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.
